title: Griha Pravesh
subtitle: House Warming Ceremony
description: Invite prosperity and divine blessings into your new home with authentic Vedic Griha Pravesh puja performed with verified rituals and sacred mantras.

title: Satyanarayan Katha
subtitle: Prosperity & Harmony
description: Bring harmony and abundance to your family through the sacred Satyanarayan Swamy Katha, performed on Purnima or special occasions with full Vedic vidhi.

title: Vivah Sanskar
subtitle: Vedic Wedding Ceremony
description: Complete Vedic Wedding ceremony conducting all rituals from Jaymala to Kanyadaan with profound spiritual explanation and traditional mantras.

title: Mahamrityunjaya Jaap
subtitle: Healing & Longevity
description: Powerful healing mantra chanting for longevity, health, and overcoming fear. Performed with 11 or 21 Brahmins for maximum spiritual energy.

title: Rudrabhishek
subtitle: Sacred Shiva Puja
description: Sacred abhishekam of Lord Shiva with milk, honey, and holy water for removing negativity, fulfilling desires and attaining divine blessings.

title: Mundan Sanskar
subtitle: First Haircut Ceremony
description: Traditional ceremony for child's first haircut symbolizing purity, growth, and divine blessings. Performed with proper Vedic mantras and rituals.
